welcome.title: Hi! Welcome to our exploration lab!
welcome.subtitle: Get your gloves and safety glasses on, because we’re about to make something big.

not-found.subtitle: The page that you requested could not be found.

what-is-cavepot.title: What is CavePot
what-is-cavepot.text1:
We are curious about the world, that’s why we also call ourselves developers of ideas.
We work hand by hand with our clients, with an open minded attitude towards creativity and innovation, this is the compass that guides us.
what-is-cavepot.text2:
We help you design, validate and build the products that you you always wanted to create, giving you a fast ROI
Transform your dreams and needs into reality.
what-is-cavepot.text3:
We provide the best combination of passion and skills for your needs.
What's the idea you want to bring to life? Tell us what you need, we’ll turn it into gold!.

what-do-we-do.title: What do we do?
what-do-we-do.sub-title: We build custom software solutions to help our clients create awesome products

card1.title: Custom App for my business.
card1.text: I need an app for my business.

card2.title: Custom product.
card2.text:
Stable multidisciplinary teams hands on with the client.
We apply agile methodologies.
Full developing teams, PO, Designers, devops and more.

card3.title: Re-design Re-think.
card3.text: You have dreamy idea but cant bring it down to earth? Let us help you re think or re design it so that you can have the project you always wanted.

card4.title: Staff Augmentation.
card4.text:
It refers to the use of outside personnel on a temporary basis to augment the capacity of your organization.
It works as an outsourcing strategy

how-we-do-it.title: How we do it
how-we-do-it.text1: Every project we work on is like entering a cave. Curious and willing to do our best, we ask ourselves: what amazing things lie underground?
how-we-do-it.text2: Elements of nature create phenomenons when they are together, merging to create something great, such as your needs combined with our skills.
how-we-do-it.text3: Your needs work as a compass for us, in a map that guide us into what we will create, pouring all of that into our pot and finally cooking something great for you.
how-we-do-it.text4: Let us explore your idea, finding the perfect elements for it so we can bring it to life.

clients-says.title: This is what our clients say
